title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations                         Moccasin Bend: The Key to Chattanooga In the Fall of 1863, Union and Confederate forces both realized that Moccasin Bend was the "Key to Chattanooga."   Duration:1 minute, 32 seconds                                Timeline 1860: Stump Speeches For the 150th Anniversary of the Battle of Chickamauga, the park conducted a series of timeline programs on the years leading up to and after the battle.
